title: signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x80 addr=0x0 pc=0xacc4fa
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.10.8-stable`
OS & Version: `Ubuntu 20.04.3 LTS`

#### Expected behaviour
geth stays in sync and runs flawlessly

#### Actual behaviour
geth crashes

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
unclear as of now
